content.rendered:
Directed by A.R. Murugadoss.

Written by Jayamohan. A.R. Murugadoss. A.R. Murugadoss. A.R. Murugadoss. Krish Thirukumaran.

Cast Joseph Vijay(Sundar Ramasamy). Keerthy Suresh(Nila). Varalaxmi Sarathkumar(Komalavalli (Pappa)). Yogi Babu(Kaushik). A.R. Murugadoss(Cameo appearance). Tulasi(M. Masilamani’s wife). Kalyani Natarajan(Sundar Ramasamy’s Mother (as Kalyani N.)). Pala Karuppaiah(M. Masilamani). Jayadithya(Kaushal (Vijay’s nephew) (as Jayaditya Kang)). Livingston(Nila’s Father). Prem Kumar(Sundar Ramasamy’s Brother (as Prem)). Joy Badlani(Bar Club Owner). Radha Ravi(Malarvannan). Lallu(IIT Student). Elyssa Erhardt(Elyssa).Mozammel Hoshen Chowdhury.Simran Gupta. Shivashankar(Election commissioner). Monique Kozlowski(Las Vegas Dancer). Roger Julian Cross(Business Shopper). Derrick Boyce(Dancer). Aarash Shah(Personal Bodyguard). Papri Ghosh(Sundar Ramasamy’s sister-in-law). Vaishali Thaniga(A voter). Karthik Nagarajan(IIT Student). Kayla Kalisz(Dancer). Jashwanth Kannan(IIT Student)

Language Tamil.

Producers Rukhshida David. Kalanidhi Maran. Ilana Rossein.

Production Sun Pictures.
